GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.94
GSD.description:
drm/amdgpu/fence: Fix oops due to non-matching drm_sched init/fini

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.94 by commit 2e557c8ca2c585bdef591b8503ba83b85f5d0afd, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 067f44c8b4590c3f24d21a037578a478590f2175. For more details please see the references link.
